verses.verse: And I <S%G2476>stood<s%> on the <S%G285>sand<s%> of the <S%G2281>sea,<s%> and <S%G1492>saw<s%> a <S%G2342>beast<s%> <S%G305>rise<s%> up out of the <S%G2281>sea,<s%> <S%G2192>having<s%> <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G2776>heads<s%> and <S%G1176>ten<s%> <S%G2768>horns,<s%> and on his <S%G2768>horns<s%> <S%G1176>ten<s%> <S%G1238>crowns,<s%> and on his <S%G2776>heads<s%> the <S%G3686>name<s%> of <S%G988>blasphemy.<s%>

And the <S%G2342>beast<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> I <S%G1492>saw<s%> was <S%G3664>like<s%> to a <S%G3917>leopard,<s%> and his <S%G4228>feet<s%> were as the <S%G4228>feet<s%> of a <S%G715>bear,<s%> and his <S%G4750>mouth<s%> as the <S%G4750>mouth<s%> of a <S%G3023>lion:<s%> and the <S%G1404>dragon<s%> <S%G1325>gave<s%> him his <S%G1411>power,<s%> and his <S%G2362>seat,<s%> and <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G1849>authority.<s%>

And I <S%G1492>saw<s%> <S%G3391>one<s%> of his <S%G2776>heads<s%> as it were <S%G4969>wounded<s%> to <S%G2288>death;<s%> and his <S%G2288>deadly<s%> <S%G4127>wound<s%> was <S%G2323>healed:<s%> and <S%G3650>all<s%> the <S%G1093>world<s%> <S%G2296>wondered<s%> <S%G3694>after<s%> the <S%G2342>beast.<s%>

And they <S%G4352>worshipped<s%> the <S%G1404>dragon<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G1325>gave<s%> <S%G1849>power<s%> to the <S%G2342>beast:<s%> and they <S%G4352>worshipped<s%> the <S%G2342>beast,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G5101>Who<s%> is <S%G3664>like<s%> to the <S%G2342>beast?<s%> <S%G5101>who<s%> is <S%G1410>able<s%> to <S%G4170>make<s%> <S%G4170>war<s%> with him?

And there was <S%G1325>given<s%> to him a <S%G4750>mouth<s%> <S%G2980>speaking<s%> <S%G3173>great<s%> things and <S%G988>blasphemies;<s%> and <S%G1849>power<s%> was <S%G1325>given<s%> to him to <S%G4160>continue<s%> <S%G5062>forty<s%> and <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G3376>months.<s%>

And he <S%G455>opened<s%> his <S%G4750>mouth<s%> in <S%G988>blasphemy<s%> <S%G4314>against<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> to <S%G987>blaspheme<s%> his <S%G3686>name,<s%> and his <S%G4633>tabernacle,<s%> and them that <S%G4637>dwell<s%> in <S%G3772>heaven.<s%>

And it was <S%G1325>given<s%> to him to <S%G4160>make<s%> <S%G4171>war<s%> with the <S%G40>saints,<s%> and to <S%G3528>overcome<s%> them: and <S%G1849>power<s%> was <S%G1325>given<s%> him <S%G1909>over<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G5443>kindreds,<s%> and <S%G1100>tongues,<s%> and <S%G1484>nations.<s%>

And <S%G3956>all<s%> that <S%G2730>dwell<s%> on the <S%G1093>earth<s%> shall <S%G4352>worship<s%> him, <S%G3739>whose<s%> <S%G3686>names<s%> are not <S%G1125>written<s%> in the <S%G976>book<s%> of <S%G2222>life<s%> of the <S%G721>Lamb<s%> <S%G4969>slain<s%> from the <S%G2602>foundation<s%> of the <S%G2889>world.<s%>

He that <S%G4863>leads<s%> into <S%G161>captivity<s%> shall <S%G5217>go<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G161>captivity:<s%> he that <S%G615>kills<s%> with the <S%G3162>sword<s%> <S%G1163>must<s%> be <S%G615>killed<s%> with the <S%G3162>sword.<s%> <S%G5602>Here<s%> is the <S%G5281>patience<s%> and the <S%G4102>faith<s%> of the <S%G40>saints.<s%>

And I <S%G1492>beheld<s%> <S%G243>another<s%> <S%G2342>beast<s%> <S%G305>coming<s%> up out of the <S%G1093>earth;<s%> and he <S%G2192>had<s%> <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G2768>horns<s%> <S%G3664>like<s%> a <S%G721>lamb,<s%> and he <S%G2980>spoke<s%> as a <S%G1404>dragon.<s%>

And he <S%G4160>excercises<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G1849>power<s%> of the <S%G4413>first<s%> <S%G2342>beast<s%> <S%G1799>before<s%> him, and <S%G4160>causes<s%> the <S%G1093>earth<s%> and them which <S%G2730>dwell<s%> <S%G1722>therein<s%> <S%G846><s%> to <S%G4352>worship<s%> the <S%G4413>first<s%> <S%G2342>beast,<s%> <S%G3739>whose<s%> <S%G2288>deadly<s%> <S%G4127>wound<s%> was <S%G2323>healed.<s%>

And he <S%G4160>does<s%> <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G4592>wonders,<s%> <S%G2443>so<s%> that he <S%G4160>makes<s%> <S%G4442>fire<s%> <S%G2597>come<s%> <S%G2597>down<s%> from <S%G3772>heaven<s%> <S%G1519>on<s%> the <S%G1093>earth<s%> in the <S%G1799>sight<s%> of <S%G444>men,<s%>

And <S%G4105>deceives<s%> them that <S%G2730>dwell<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> the <S%G1093>earth<s%> by the means of <S%G3588>those<s%> <S%G4592>miracles<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> he had <S%G1325>power<s%> to <S%G4160>do<s%> in the <S%G1799>sight<s%> of the <S%G2342>beast;<s%> <S%G3004>saying<s%> to them that <S%G2730>dwell<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> the <S%G1093>earth,<s%> that they should <S%G4160>make<s%> an <S%G1504>image<s%> to the <S%G2342>beast,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G2192>had<s%> the <S%G4127>wound<s%> by a <S%G3162>sword,<s%> and did <S%G2198>live.<s%>

And he had <S%G1325>power<s%> to <S%G1325>give<s%> <S%G4151>life<s%> to the <S%G1504>image<s%> of the <S%G2342>beast,<s%> that the <S%G1504>image<s%> of the <S%G2342>beast<s%> should <S%G2532>both<s%> <S%G2980>speak,<s%> and <S%G4160>cause<s%> that as <S%G3745>many<s%> as would not <S%G4352>worship<s%> the <S%G1504>image<s%> of the <S%G2342>beast<s%> should be <S%G615>killed.<s%>

And he <S%G4160>causes<s%> <S%G3956>all,<s%> both <S%G3398>small<s%> and <S%G3173>great,<s%> <S%G4145>rich<s%> and <S%G4434>poor,<s%> <S%G1658>free<s%> and <S%G1401>bond,<s%> to <S%G1325>receive<s%> a <S%G5480>mark<s%> in their <S%G1188>right<s%> <S%G5495>hand,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> in their <S%G3359>foreheads:<s%>

And that <S%G3361>no<s%> <S%G5100>man<s%> <S%G1410>might<s%> <S%G59>buy<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G4453>sell,<s%> <S%G1508>save<s%> he that <S%G2192>had<s%> the <S%G5480>mark,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> the <S%G3686>name<s%> of the <S%G2342>beast,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> the <S%G706>number<s%> of his <S%G3686>name.<s%>

<S%G5602>Here<s%> is <S%G4678>wisdom.<s%> Let him that <S%G2192>has<s%> <S%G3563>understanding<s%> <S%G5585>count<s%> the <S%G706>number<s%> of the <S%G2342>beast:<s%> for it is the <S%G706>number<s%> of a <S%G444>man;<s%> and his <S%G706>number<s%> is <S%G5516>Six<s%> <S%G5516>hundred<s%> three <S%G5516>score<s%> and <S%G5516>six.<s%>
